item.title: Let's style up our appliction with Bootswatch!
item.description: Bootswatch is a free collection of Bootstrap themes that offers a variety of easy-to-use and customizable themes for quickly adding visual style to Bootstrap websites or applications. Each theme comes with a CSS file and optional JavaScript files for convenience and customization. Bootswatch is a great way to add style and visual appeal to Bootstrap projects without spending a lot of time designing and coding from scratch. Now that we have our application up and running, let’s style it up with Bootswatch!
